Greek & RomanCtic) Landscape.

T— Beauty and the Beast—The Princess out for a very long walk, and the Sphinx'out (it is to be hoped) for a very long
run—Music hath charms—.Virtuous indignation of Mercury at the shameful treatment of a valuable servant.

THE SPHINX'S LARDER.

A poetically Licensed Victualler.—The Monster's Provisional Government—The weak-headed Thehana and the headstrong Corinthian—Immense piling up of agony and intensity, leading to an unexpected and inconceivable Denouement,

T H E SPHINX'S LARDER.
Rising Young Men—OBdipu. makes_a call upon the Plough-shareholders—Protection for the Agricultural Inteiestg.

The Beauty and the Beast—Th e Princess out for a very long walk, and the Sphinx out (it is to be hoped) for a very long
run—Music hath charms—Virtuous indignation of Mercury at the shameful treatment of a valuable servant.

A poetically Licensed Victualler—The Monster's Provisional Government—The weak-headed Thebans and the headstrong Corinthian—Immense piling up of agony and intensity, leading- to an unexpected and inconceivable Denouement.

THE ENIGMA SOLVED!!

The Sphinx*. Career is brought to a close by a crack-brained proceeding—and t h . curtain falls up.n a Magnificent

T H E SPHINX'S LARDER.

A poetically Licensed Victualler—The Monster's Provisional Government—The weak-headed Thebrnv. and the hea..etrong Corinthian—Immense piling up of agony and intensity, leading to an unexpected and inconceivable Denouement.

THE ENIGMA SOLVED!!

The Sphinx's Career i, brought to a close by a crack-brained proceeding—and the curtain falls u[>on a Magnificent

A poetically Licensed Victualler—The Moaster's Provisional Government—The Teak-headed Thebans and the headstrong Corinthian—Immense piling up of agony and intensity, leading to an unexpected and inconceivable Denouement.

of the word. It will keep possession of the stage."— SUN.

SERIOUS FAMILY,
